website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight glasses with an upscale retro feel.
pros: Round shape offers more UVA protection for the face
cons: They look too large on smaller faces

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty sure these are knock offs
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure these are knock offs. I should have written this review when I first noticed the irregularities, but I didn't. Kind of a bummer for a $100 pair of shades. Live and learn and buy from a reputable source next time. If you look at the left arm you can see that the silver corner piece is not only off kilter, but you can see the indent for where it "should have been" placed. And it's backwards, because it's not symmetrical. The right arm seems to have it placed correctly. Let's be honest, what I received was/is a straight up knock off, which is pretty much infuriating.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: knock offs.....so incredibly cheap...do not buy sunglasses here
customer_reviews.text: I got the Jackie Ohh 1's and Jackie Ohh 2's, and they were both so incredibly cheaply made. They were most definitely the quality of gas station sunglasses. I googled, what do real Raybans have and they have a engraved RB on the 'glass', not plastic eye glass lens.... but other than that missing detail, they were constructed from the cheapest materials...litterally felt like a toy...and they were $120.00-$150.00. I decided to GO to Sunglass Hut and see a pair of there glasses the difference was HUGE. They were $170, but at least they are the real deal. UGH! I get angry every time I think of these people ripping shoppers off.... NOT COOL.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Love my Jackie O Ray Bans
customer_reviews.text: Love them and wore them on my 2000 mi drive to Keystone and snow skiing . They worked wonderful and I looked glamorous in them .
customer_reviews.author: Grace Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this sunglasses: the shape, the unique color and the fit. I've very satisfied with my purchase & highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amile & Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing - Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses as a XMAS present to replace an older pair of genuine Jackie Ohh's. These are good fakes, but a careful comparison with the older article found a number of discrepancies. They are slightly lighter, there is a seam in the plastic by the nose piece, the RB engraving on the left lens of the original is on the front surface, but on the fake it is a cheaper print on the rear. To be honest, I didn't see these things at first, but my wife called it as soon as she opened her gift. Too bad Amazon doesn't do anything to police this sort of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I bought ones that were shipped by and sold by amazon, and they look and feel real to me, as amazon is an authorized rayban seller. They came with a case. I think they would flatter basically any face, especially if you have more of an oval face. I have sensitive eyes and these work great outside with glare and making everything sharper and easier on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows a brown tortoise color frame. The ones I received were mainly black with a little tortoise color if you looked hard. I was immediately sent another pair. They were exactly the same way. I have had a pair just like the pict shows, and wanted another pair. I will be returning both pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I read reviews and was super paranoid if they would send non-polarized lenses
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and was super paranoid if they would send non-polarized lenses. Lucked out and it came as polarized as they advertised. I have a typical Asian face so I lack a bridge for my nose so it slightly tilts forward. I think also it how the arms of the glasses sit on my ears. The sunglasses come with the standard soft Ray Ban case with cloth.
customer_reviews.author: TuxedoSam

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses! I have owned several pairs of Ray Bans, but these are by far my favorite. I was afraid they might be a little bit, from reading some of the other reviews, but they fit perfectly. The lenses are slightly larger than the others I've had, but I prefer my sunglasses to wrap, and cover my eyes completely. There is no point in sunlight getting in through the sides. They fit my face perfectly, and I couldn't be happier with them! My only problem with them is that my husband tries to steal them!
customer_reviews.author: D. Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Love these Ray-Bans! Perfect look!
customer_reviews.text: Super hot glasses! Mine are the black; have gotten compliments in last cpl weeks since receiving them. They have the look of the popular over-sized frames, but still sporty & practical. Not so trendy that they would've been a waste of money in a few months. I also feel like these compliment my round-shaped face, which I was a bit worried about prior to buying. AND these glasses don't get caught in your hair when pushed up on top of your head! Bonus! (Ouch)
customer_reviews.author: Lucky__one

customer_reviews.title: Complete Knockoffs nothing like described
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on in the store and loved them. The shades I received were absolutely not the same as the ones I tried in the store and are definitely a knockoff. They aren’t even the same shape as the ones pictured by other customers. I ordered the gradient green lenses and got black on black. The shape is completely off and these are not the real Jackie Ohh shades from the store. No where close
customer_reviews.author: Trisheana

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sunglasses! Great style!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses! First pair of Ray-Ban’s and I never could understand what the big deal was about having quality shades. Well I understand why now!! They feel better on my face, the lenses are so crisp and clear to look through. Worth every penny in my opinion. The Jackie Ohh style is fabulous as well. Just a soft lift on either side and really seems to be a shape that will look good on anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Charity S.

customer_reviews.title: Great shades! 😎
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses, they are high-quality, and definitely authentic! Fast shipping, and no complaints! :) I have a bigger, (much) cheaper version of these, and they cannot compare.
customer_reviews.author: Greatlakesgirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses! They are the perfect size and fit my face perfectly. I actually already own a pair of these that I got as a gift but they were not polarized. I've been looking for this shape for some time, to replace my favourite pair of Ralph Lauren sunglasses. Very happy with these sunglasses. They are exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: artihc

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! I wish they were a bit bigger. These are my go to glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Fashion and Clarity In The Sun
customer_reviews.text: The best part of these sunglasses are that they are polarized. You can wear them in lower levels of sunlight and they aren't "too dark." The lenses also aren't "too big." I have worn many of this style of sunglasses and Rayban seems to have found a happy medium between looking like a bug and being fashionable. My only complaint with them is that I lost my first pair. Serves me right for traveling with them. EVERY time I travel with a pair of high end sunglasses, I lose them. I need to have a garbage $10 pair to insure I don't lose THIS pair. UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Vinyl Queen

customer_reviews.title: Classy and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Jackie Ohh sunglasses, I lost my last pair :( These are a great pair of sunglasses. They fit very well as I have no bridge and keep the sun out of my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Logo overload!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sunglasses I don't like how their logo is plastered every where including on front of the glasses in white. I may as well carry a large sign over my head telling the world I'm wearing Ray Bans. Looking for a way to remove white logo on front without ruining glasses. If you are the type of person that is impressed by name brand stuff and want everyone to know what you are wearing these are for you. RB is even etched in the other glass - gee whiz!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: The Sophisticated Timeless Look
customer_reviews.text: I love the sophistication and comfort of the glasses. I highly recommend this awesome product. They literally make the whole world look better. I like the polarized version that is always marked with an added P after RAY BANS on the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: First class product and service.
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review mentioning that I had not received a cleaning cloth. Well one is being delivered 2 day shipping. How's that for service? And I love my Jackie O sunglasses. Good quality and Rayban classy. Very glamorous. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Sharples

customer_reviews.title: The lenses are nice and dark and are polarized
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very well made and arrived timely/packaged well. The lenses are nice and dark and are polarized. I am very happy with them. I have a wide head, and I was a little disappointed that the arms are not spring loaded to provide some more room at the temples, but they are very comfortable. I suppose it is my mistake for not inquiring about then. Oh well, we live and learn. It was money well spent in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle Vhoss

customer_reviews.title: Decent pair
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. She loves them. After doing some research, I don’t see where others are saying there “knockoffs”. Unless I’m naive, they have all the indications of the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: RetVet

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses but no cleaning kit included
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get my Ray Bans and they seem to be great...comfy and stylish. Just a heads up, I did not receive the cleaning kit shown in the picture, only the cloth. Not a huge deal but I like to get what I’m promised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these based on the excellent reviews. They are g15 xtl which are glass ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on the excellent reviews. They are g15 xtl which are glass lens and xtl stands for extra light weight, but they are heavy. They leave marks and tension on my nose and I only wear them when I drive usually 15 minutes drive. I am asian with flat nose. Maybe they fit Caucasian women better.
customer_reviews.author: william gibson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful classic style!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! This is my second pair of this exact model (different color) and I still love wearing them after all these years! I was a little nervous and wanting to make sure I’d get authentic RB and these totally are - they have the telltale little ‘rb’ engraved in the lense.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle S.

customer_reviews.title: My fav pair
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite pair of ray bans. Fit my face just right. They don’t slide off of my face and they don’t get tangled in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: cola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Round/Square Faces
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are my absolute favorites. This is my second pair. I'm sad they don't offer the polarized lens in every frame color. I have a round/square face and they fit my face very well. I usually have a problem with the lenses sitting too far away from my forehead (letting extra light in), vs. my eyelashes brushing the lens, these fit perfect! I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Holly D

customer_reviews.title: These are 1.00 glasses. I think they are knock offs! Be warned
customer_reviews.text: Amazon please check on this. The plastic was thin, the lenses were NOT polarized! How could you sell these. #RAYBAN investigate this!
customer_reviews.author: era

customer_reviews.title: They were late, but PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: They were EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED, outdoor weddings need GREAT shades and these are them. I can't tell you how much I love them. I had to send a pair back but that was just a simple error. After they corrected the error it took 17 days to get here but I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Gafford

customer_reviews.title: counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: these are not rayban sunglasses , they are a cheap plastic counterfeit. they are not polarized
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha Khan

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: If your light sensitive these are great! But don't lose them! There not that easy to replace because of the price point. I'll purchase again budget permitting. Mia
customer_reviews.author: Irene Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the polarization - it really helped eliminate glare. I would recommend these over the non-polarized ones. They are worth the extra money. Like the look of the glasses too. This was the best price I found for them.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks like they are used!
customer_reviews.text: Glasses arrived dirty with fingerprints and looks like they were used! Pay good money for Raybans I would expect them to be packaged with the original stickers and packaging
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Nice style but frame is too thin
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of sunglasses but since they are made to be light weight the frame is thinner than other models. The borders are not that round and almost feel like it is like not originals.
customer_reviews.author: m777

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sunglasses many years ago on my vacation 10 years ago and fell in love with them. Due to bad scratches I wanted to get me the same ones and was happy to find them thru amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Saveatree

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Jackie Ohhs
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. I was very happy to find them at this price. They are genuine Ray-bans. They complied with all the requirements I found in the research I did before purchasing them, because I thought this price was too good to be true. Well, at least for this pair, it was true. I am very satisfied. And they are polarized.
customer_reviews.author: Ana R. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: ... lenses were ok but the quality wasn't nearly as good as my maui jims
customer_reviews.text: The polarized lenses were ok but the quality wasn't nearly as good as my maui jims. The glasses made a creaking noise every time I opened or closed the side pieces (not sure what those are called). They were too wide for my face and they were constantly falling off. I definitely couldn't wear them on top of my head because they'd fall off. One of the screws was loose the entire time I had them, and after 1.5 years the screw fell out. I could probably replace the screw but I wasn't that impressed with the glasses overall, so I think I'll just buy a different pair (just not Ray Bans).
customer_reviews.author: emmy

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expected - CHEAP PLASTIC, NO GLASS, ALL PLASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas Gift - no way CAN I GIVE THESE AS A GIFT - Seller said glass lenses, NO! Plastic and very cheap, Frames are the same, Very Cheap feeling and no weight what so ever! Calling Amazon! OUTRAGOUS!!! I have a $7 pair of sunglasses, NO DIFFERENCE WHAT SO EVER!!! VERY DISSAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Best shades for women
customer_reviews.text: Raybans are the best, these have glass lenses so they are hard to scratch. The look is timeless, great for those with brown hair. The Amazon price saved us a lot when compared to the hut. Look at the lens for the engraved rb to know that they are authentic. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GreatScott

customer_reviews.title: Ray Ban No Glare
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to take on my cruise. The fit is perfect. No glare, could see through clearly even out on the waster. This is my first purchase of a Ray Ban product. You have a customer for life! Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: If your wife likes aviator-type glasses, she'll probably like these too
customer_reviews.text: My beautiful 37-year old trendy wife absolutely loves these glasses. I bought them after she dropped her beloved Ray-Ban aviators and shattered a lens. I figured they were something different. She gets compliments from her friends constantly. They're very good quality, made in Italy. Every woman adores Jackie Onassis, the inspiration for these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Marineguy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable frames on my oval face
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable frames on my oval face. I drive constantly in sunny California and need dark glasses to protect against the bright sun. I've tried countless brands of sunglasses, Gucci Dolce Gabbana, Nicole's, Armani etc. These Ray-Ban's are still my favorite in terms of quality and protecting my eyes. These work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! I bought a pair in black a while back and wanted another pair and these were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: cola

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: 2 Nd pair. My 1st lasted 6 years. My bad for dropping them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Oh No

customer_reviews.title: Classy but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and quality of the sunglasses, but are a little heavy and have a tendency to slide down on my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Rgm52

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: She lost a pair on our trip in ocean. I finally replaced it after few yeRs. This is her favorite pair.
customer_reviews.author: Critic1967

customer_reviews.title: Channeling Jackie O
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses. My daughter bought them on eBay and I thought she looked great. I tried hers on and had to have them. They stay on my head, either wearing them regularly or holding my hair back like a headband and the lens tint works well too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mac

customer_reviews.title: These are great sunglasses and I love them
customer_reviews.text: These are great sunglasses and I love them. They are perfect for very bright days. They are polarized as advertised, and have the P next to the RayBan brand on the upper part of the crystal. They are not too big and have a nice shape which gives you a sophisticated look. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TruthfulShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses but too big for my smaller heart shape ...
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses but too big for my smaller heart shape face. Perfect Jackie style if that’s what you’re looking for!
customer_reviews.author: ASGee

customer_reviews.title: Eye spy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses that came packed really nicely and will all the tools to keep them looking great. The lenses are perfect, not too dark or light and really allow the eyes to relax. The size is good, but kind of middle ground between normal and obnoxiously big.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Are these glasses the real thing?
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I like these glasses.. Are they really Ray-Bans? They are not made with the same quality as my other Ray Bans; They sound like they are going to break . Look good, but quality Not great. I am debating about whether to keep them or not. Delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses...would highly recommend purchasing the polarized glasses as they really cut the glare of sun and snow. I do, however, agree with another reviewer that the frames feel a little cheap. But they are light and feel extremely comfortable on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye Michaelis

customer_reviews.title: The perfect sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid sunglasses "enthusiast". I own over 100 pairs of D & G, coach, oakleys, Ray bans, etc. and these sunglasses by far are my favorite. The fit is perfect, the style is so classic, and these can be worn dressed up or dressed down. If you are looking for the perfect pair of sunglasses, buy these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: My pretty lady loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my pretty lady, she loves them. Now she can shop and go all the places she wants and no one will know she's high out of her mind. Thanks to Ray-ban sunglasses for getting together with Amazon and making it possible for the love of my life to walk around with the norms obliterated and them none the wiser. Sincerely, Nicholas Scafidi
customer_reviews.author: Slim386

customer_reviews.title: comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sunglasses I've had. I bought the gray lens. Excellent filter.
customer_reviews.author: Whiddycat

customer_reviews.title: every now and then she would borrow my wayfarers and comment on how clear everything was and how good they felt
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend only wore cheap sunglasses since I met her, every now and then she would borrow my wayfarers and comment on how clear everything was and how good they felt. I bought her these as a Christmas present and 4 months later she is still thanking me!
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Look used
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed by how much I spent on these. I’ve never owned a pair of ray-ban before. The glasses were in a case but yet the glasses were dirty and full of fingerprints. I doubt they are the real thing. I feel like I could have gone to Walmart and bought better quality for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome . Nice lenses for beach or driving
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to my Lady and she LOVES THEM . Won many points !
customer_reviews.author: Professor J, Princeton NJ

customer_reviews.title: Good looking sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of sunglasses without trying them on (and that was a HUGE gamble as I have a round short face and tend to have difficulty finding a fitting pair) and I am soooo glad they look good on me. They are a bit on the bigger side, but it is not overwhelming at all, plus big glasses look cute on most girls. I totally recommend them. -Day
customer_reviews.author: Miguel & Day

customer_reviews.title: Low quality feel
customer_reviews.text: These are not G15 lenses. The frame feels inexpensive. I have worn ray and for years — very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair and I simply love them -- perfect shape for my oval face (I tend to have a hard time finding flattering sunglasses). The first pair lasted four years, despite the fact that I'm really hard on my sunglasses. I finally retired them, but will keep them as a back-up.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Hello, Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: These really are 5 star sunglasses. I couldn't believe all the good reviews and how much everyone loved the way they look, until I received mine and tried them on. They're perfect! I know aviators and wayfarers are the "it" sunglasses right now, but these are timeless! Love them and so flattering.
customer_reviews.author: gardenfanatic

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! Treated myself to new Ray-Bans for the cruise I am taking soon! Great carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Love these sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight these glasses are - so comfortable. They look great with everything from workout gear to dressing up.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality.
customer_reviews.text: Saw this glass in a Ray-Ban store, and bought it in amazon. Quality is very bad. Doesn't give sunglass effect. $45 Nautica glass is far better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Kannanc

customer_reviews.title: Jackie Ohh glasses
customer_reviews.text: My wife love these glasses. Polarized lenses and great fit for her face.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wilson

customer_reviews.title: U will love it if you like square frame
customer_reviews.text: It fits comfortable. It is polarized lens as described. I like that the bottom of the frame barely touch my face. But it just looks too square for my face shape. I debated for almost a week and I decided to return it. I bought 4191 polarized instead elsewhere because Amazon don't carry that model.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa W.

customer_reviews.title: Questioning the authenticity
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but I don’t believe they are true Ray bans. The product weight feels off, the case is different with a very smudged official Ray ban seal, you can feel rigid plastic seams All along the glasses frame.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a gift...and I LOVE them!!!!! They fit my head PERFECTLY!! I have a hard time finding sunglasses that 'stay' on properly without squeezing the snot out of my head!! LOL! But these glasses fit snuggly without 'vice gripping' my cranium! AND they look FABULOUS!! The hubs did a good job pickin' this bday gift!!! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase. I believe this product is from the defect pile, but the defect is so tiny that it doesn't affect the lens. And for the price, I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape of these Ray-bans. They are also very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I received these glasses with a letter from the seller assuring me of their authenticity. I'm just going to assume it's legitimate. I did think they were going to be bigger than they are so I think they look ok on me, but not exactly as I had hoped. If you're looking for big sunglasses I'd choose a different style.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyto3Loves

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Wife has pretty much replaced her Costas with these nowadays. Basic black, classic look. Edges of frame could stand to be smoothed out a bit but that doesn't detract from the looks.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Price

customer_reviews.title: Amazing glasses the grey and lavender show though and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing glasses the grey and lavender show though and the glasses are one of a kind with sun reflection
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Collins

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that a review for sunglasses is helpful because everyone's face shape is different, but I purchased a pair of Prada sunglasses just prior to this purchase and I love these glasses much more!! They fit comfortably on my face and they look better :)
customer_reviews.author: Tavi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Me!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect glasses for me, stylish, comfortable and arrived as described! ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: they are polarized and look amazing! I purchased this for my mom and they ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading other comments I was worried that I may receive a non-Polarized glass! I was wrong! they are polarized and look amazing! I purchased this for my mom and they are slightly large for her face. Well, she thinks they look just perfect, and she loves them. I believe they are slightly large!
customer_reviews.author: siamak javadi

customer_reviews.title: Ray-Ban for ever
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order,and its night time,i cannot wait for tomorrow morning to show off my glasses.This is my 1 1st time ordering a glasses but i tried so many at stores.And usually doesn't fit me very well.But this Ray-Ban is unbelievable comfortable ,is amazing.I definitely can say Ray-Ban gonna be my glasses brands for ever.
customer_reviews.author: D.F

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They fit great and are the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: hrc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Best pair of shades I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Veronique Westfall

customer_reviews.title: Description Wrong
customer_reviews.text: I loved these sunglasses. They looked great and fit perfectly BUT they were not polarized as the description stated. I paid for polarized glasses. I'm returning them and buying a new pair at a retail store so I can be sure to get what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Moresco

customer_reviews.title: You can feel the quality
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Great UV protection. Quality heft and yet, lightweight on your face. Unless I do something dumb, I think they will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Bethlehem

customer_reviews.title: Not polarized, false advertising
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses, BUT as someone else had an issue with, they are NOT polarized. False advertising. They are being returned. Very disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Stylish yet not too big.
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish yet not too big. Purchased frames and had my own prescription lens set in them. The green lens look black from the outside, I'm very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: CollegeKid Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I Love these glasses! Classic design, quality workmanship, and described and pictured exactly!
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: I love these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses. The color is dynamic, with that little bit of red, but mostly, I just love the way they fit and keep the sun and glare from these old eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Fake! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These are fake. Very disappointed. First when I unboxed them they were dirty. Fingerprints all over the lenses. Then I looked for the RB on the inside of the lens. It was missing. These are fake fake fake! Really disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My girl like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for this glasses for my girl, my friend advice me for this one and luckily I found it at amazon. My girl like it very much..
customer_reviews.author: SPEED

customer_reviews.title: Not sure they were authentic RayBans...returned!
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived crushed. Glasses had grime on the ear pieces like they had been handled or worn prior. Some flaws in the texture of the frame. Maybe knock-offs, maybe not, but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Perfect size to be large size style ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife really likes them. Very good quality. Perfect size to be large size style she wanted but not too big. Fit really well too. Everything one would expect from Ray Ban.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Malloy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of sunglasses, Ray Ban JackieO
customer_reviews.text: Really great sunglasses. Excellent quality, and can't beat Amazon's price. One thing you should know is that the frames, from the front, appear more black than tortoise shell. Not an issue for me, and may vary with different frames.
customer_reviews.author: E. Weinberger

customer_reviews.title: These are fine, I had a pair for several years that ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fine, I had a pair for several years that I loved...lost & wanted to replace w/ same or similar. These seem different, feels like a cheaper plastic, I did look at them at a Sunglass Hut and they felt the same... I do like them! And, wear them everyday...they are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Akeansky

customer_reviews.title: RayBans are still Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shades! They are comfortable and fit nicely- great coverage! I have a wide face so It is hard to find glasses that fit, these are great. Would recommend and will buy Ray Ban again!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopaholic

customer_reviews.title: The quality is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this is the second sunglasses I buy same style
customer_reviews.author: Marla Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Meh 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: They’re nice but not like in the pic. They’re very dark tortoise shell not “light Havana” as labeled. Luckily I was able to return.
customer_reviews.author: April Dee

customer_reviews.title: Had a pair similar that were a bit better
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find these Jackie O sunglasses, as they are similar to a round pair had last year- these are great, but liked the round ones a tad better. These fit well, and I would buy them again. It's difficult to find the Jackie O's in polarized, so these were a great find.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Barlow

customer_reviews.title: I did get to see them and they are gorgeous I love them and can hardly wait another 20 days to ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't got to wear them yet my husband bought them for me as a birthday gift and he is holding out until my birthday. I did get to see them and they are gorgeous I love them and can hardly wait another 20 days to put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Sassycat

customer_reviews.title: Lighter than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The weight of these are lighter than I expected, but they're super nice! My wife loves them and looks HOT in them!
customer_reviews.author: Robin  J.

customer_reviews.title: they are nice and I like them
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses fit me well, they are nice and I like them. I usually buy Kaenon Sunglasses, which cost a bit more and I think are a better made pair of sunglasses. So I'll probably just stick with the Kaenons.
customer_reviews.author: realpenny

customer_reviews.title: High Style and Ray Ban Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my fiancee as she is always breaking and scratching her sun glasses in her purse, these come with a nice leather case that protects them. They look nice and they live up to the standard high quality of a Ray Ban product.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Jarvis

product_meta.title: Ray-Ban Women's RB4101 Jackie Ohh Sunglasses
product_meta.description:
RB4101 Jackie Ohh Sunglasses feature a modern, lightweight nylon frame and sleek rectangular lenses. The Women's RB4101 Jackie Ohh Sunglasses are available in a variety of frame colors and lens treatments including polarized, gradient and non-polarized. To protect your eyes from harmful UV rays, these sunglasses include lenses that are coated with 100% UV protection. 

Ray-Ban is the world's most iconic eyewear brand and is a global leader in its sector. Every model in the Ray-Ban collection is the product of meticulous, original styling that translates the best of the latest fashion trends into an ever-contemporary look for millions of Ray-Ban wearers around the world. From the early Aviator style that emerged in 1937 to the introduction of the classic Wayfarer in 1952, Ray-Ban is a brand that embodies America and adventure, great cities and wide-open spaces, heroism, individuality, and authenticity. Starting with a silver screen debut in 1961, Ray-Ban sunglasses have appeared throughout hundreds of films and have been a favorite on the Hollywood scene for years, both on and off the screen. With timeless and imaginative styles, Ray-Ban consistently blends high-tech design, lenses, and materials. The collection remains true to its classic heritage while continuously evolving to meet today's fashion demands.
feature_bullets: Acetate Frame. Acetate is a plant-based plastic known for being lightweight, yet durable.
Vintage-inspired sunglasses with prescription-ready lenses and logoed temples
Ray-Ban products include an etched "RB" on the left lens. The RB is not a scratch or defect.
The shape and curvature of these sunglasses may need adjustments. Adjustments should only be made by a professional.
